text:
The truly bizarre reason Roberto Mancini can't just waltz into the Leicester City hot seat The Italian is tied up with another employer at the moment Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Roberto Mancini on Italian version of Dancing with the Stars Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's been a quiet time for Roberto Mancini recently. 
Since his sacking by Inter Milan back in August , the Italian has been sitting at home, twiddling his thumbs, waiting for an opportunity to arise to make his return to football. 
Months passed with no action, when suddenly his friend and compatriot Claudio Ranieri was unceremoniously dumped by Leicester City. 
Out of nowhere, he was thrust back into the spotlight as favourite for the job. But there's one slight issue: he's all tied up at the moment... Robert Mancini on Dancing with the Stars (Photo: Insidefoto/MEGA) 
Yes, your eyes aren't deceiving you. That really is the 2011/12 Premier League title-winning manager all suited and booted on the d-floor. Robert Mancini on Dancing with the Stars (Photo: Insidefoto/MEGA) 
On Saturday the 52-year-old appeared on Ballando Con Le Stelle - the Italian equivalent of Dancing With The Stars - looking like a "cool" substitute teacher as he rocked a pretty powerfully grey get-up. Robert Mancini on Dancing with the Stars (Photo: Insidefoto/MEGA) 
Our knowledge of dance techniques is below zero, but for the purpose of this following picture, we're giving him a 10 for his... salsa? Robert Mancini on Dancing with the Stars (Photo: Insidefoto/MEGA) 
The Foxes are due to announce their new manager in the next few days, as they regroup with the aim of not going from champions to relegation inside a year. 
If they're looking to dance their way back up the league table, they may have found just the man... poll loading What is Roberto Mancini better at? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
